name: Blood Field
description:
Have you ever heard horror stories from your grandma? Blood Field will bring it back to you guys. Explore a sinister world with environments based on Vietnam culture and a storyline inspired by Vietnam myths and folklore. Blood Field is a first-person horror game where you play as Minh. He accidentally found out the terrible truth behind the tragic death of a young lady. The game is set in a field in which terrible things have happened. How will the killer get the ending?


Features:
• Vietnam Horror - Environment is based on horror Vietnam setting and the narrative is inspired by Vietnam myths.
• Diversity of Gameplay – Puzzles and investigations are integrated into the game for a variety of gameplay.
